channel.title: Comments on: The Wedding Present performs Bizarro on tour, while David Gedge guest edits Magnet

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I love that story. I can just picture you looking through the window. The show last night in DC was great. And well attended! Last time I saw Gedge and company at the Black Cat (2006) there was a Belle & Sebastian/New Pornographers show at The 9:30 Club and the crowd was quite thin, though appreciative. He was also at the merch booth right after that show ended, which I've always respected and admired.
item.content:encoded: I love that story. I can just picture you looking through the window. The show last night in DC was great. And well attended! Last time I saw Gedge and company at the Black Cat (2006) there was a Belle & Sebastian/New Pornographers show at The 9:30 Club and the crowd was quite thin, though appreciative. He was also at the merch booth right after that show ended, which I’ve always respected and admired.
